doc:
Deryck Guyler https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Deryck_Guyler 0 Deryck Guyler (29 April 1914 – 7 October 1999) was an English actor, best known for his portrayal of officious, short-tempered middle-aged men in sitcoms such as Please Sir! and Sykes. Deryck_Guyler ( 29_April_1914 – 7_October_1999 ) was an_English_actor , best_known for his_portrayal of officious_,_short-tempered_middle-aged_men in sitcoms such_as Please_Sir ! and Sykes .
